title: Basic SpeechRecognition tutorial
content: In this tutorial you will learn how to use your smartphone to recognize what you are saying.

Select **InteractiveWriteDraw** to make your smartphone vibrate

![simple lamp](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/Devices/Items/InteractiveWriteDraw-Item.png)

Scan the QR code with your smartphone.

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/qrscan.png)

Alternatively, click on _Open in this device_ to open the camera locally.

Move the **text** component into the workspace

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/text.png) you aslo can draw a line

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/line.png)and a point

![QrCode](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/point.png)
Write hello world in the text component ![input](https://github.com/bellinux/tutorial-protobject/raw/main/images/interactivewritedraw/hello%20world.png)
